tooltip: Select Fadoti as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Fadoti focuses on supporting the Kokiri with a variety of abilities.
Allows you to summon Fadoti, a support hero that influences others with his music.
Support unit that increases the movement speed of attached Battalion.
Kokiri Defenses (Barricades, Mudmen Towers, and Walls) become Stealthed.
Kokiri Laborers now regenerate HP when not in combat.
